post:
This July, we’re bringing new features and customization options with our VPS Hosting services. Try something new! The increased performance coming from the flexibility of eNlight cloud platform and high-availability further enhanced with customization options, i.e. VPS Hosting with more customization!

Customized VPS Options
CPUs: 1 vCPU to 8 vCPU
RAM: 1 GB to 8 GB
Disk Space: 25 GB to 100 GB

For pricing quote kindly contact our sales team via email “Sales [at] bodHOST [dot] com” or initiate a Live Chat!

Further, we made available 2 new TLDs: .Video and .Store, which will give you an opportunity to explore new prospects of business. You can also benefit from our “Application Support Services”. To use these services, kindly get in touch with sales team for further information.

Regular VPS Hosting Solutions based on eNlight Cloud and Hyper-V Cloud Architecture
